case.name: About to transform
case.description: Caulifla's about to transform. But to the outside observer, it's not entirely clear what she's about to do. Draw your own conclusions.

case.name: SSJ transformation
case.description: Caulifla just transformed into a Super Saiyan!

case.name: Has transformed
case.description: Description about what's interesting happening with the character (i.e. why should others target this?).

case.name: Taking flight
case.description: Caulifla hovers whilst taking off her boots.

case.name: Back to black
case.description: Caulifla ain't feeling herself anymore. She's dropped out of her Super Saiyan form.
